'''''The Desert Will Guide You Home (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow eight [[Seelie]] in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].
